song.title: Unleashed
song.info:
-=[UNLEASHED by Drey]=-
-Category- MP3 Music
-Product Info- Platform: Windows 7 64 bit
Host Sequencer: Steinberg Cubase 5
Instruments& Effects: .XLN Audio Addictive drums (custom preset) .NI Kontakt 4 (custom synth patches) .Refx Nexus 2 (Factory synth presets) .NI Guitarrig 5 (Custom patches) .IK Amplitube 2 (custom patches) .WAVES 7 effects (reverb, delay, compressor, EQ, etc) .Standart tuned Electric guitar (my 11 years old Jem) .Drop B tuned Electric guitar (sounds like a truck engine :D) .Drop B tuned Bass guitar (why not enchance that truck engine sound :P)
Time spent: About 2 weeks (not 2 whole weeks, random hours on random days)
Food consumed: Lots of cookies, couple of cakes, tons of cafe
Comment: A heavier tune this time, I hope you enjoy! :)
Greetings to all sceners!
-Party- 7DX Demo Party 2011
-Compo- MP3 Computer Music
